MajorClaims.Text: parents should encourage students to take the part-time job
it is better for parents to encourage them to take part-time jobs

Claims.Text: taking the part-time job can let students experience the real adult life and know more about it
they can teach students many things about adult life
we need part-time job to teach us how hard the real adult life can be
the part-time job can make people understand future life better
the part-time job will effect student' study

Premises.Text: most people they contact with are also students
there are a few opportunities for students to know how to live adult life in the university
when students do part-time jobs, they can work with many kinds of people, and most of whom are adults
My friend Lisa, who is doing part-time job now, tells me that it is fabulous to take it
Through part-time job, she makes friends with different kinds of people and they let her know the different aspects of adult life
Lisa thought in adult life, work is the core; but after she knows these friends, she changes her mind that the true core for the adult life is responsibility but not work
thanks to the information her new friends has provided; now she is more confidence about her future adult life
it is very difficult for us to really know how tense the adult life can be

some questionnaires indicate that if students have taken part-time jobs, they will make the best use of their time to prepare their future and more importantly; they will not expect too much for their future than students who have not taken the part-time job
parents always tell students that the adult life is much tenser than school life
most students will do the part-time job in their holiday
it will not effect on their study
Compared with playing computers every day, doing part-time jobs is the best choice for students to spend their holiday
